shortDescription: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in xxl-job v2.2.0 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via (1) AppName and (2)AddressList parameter in JobGroupController.java file.
vulnerabilityName: xuxueli xxl-job Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
